channel.title: BM wont launch
channel.description:
Heya
Ive installed Source SDK 2007 as requested and used setup exe to install BM. OFC i've rebootet steam, but when i start BM i get the message that says:
"Steam-Error This game is currently unavailable. Please try again at another time".
If this where a normal steam game i would just wait, but because this is a mod im shure there must have went something wrong.
What i've done so far: Re-Downloaded BM via Torrent Deletet Source SDK 2007 and 2006 (steam installs 2006 together with 2007, dunno why) After a compleate deletion of all mod/sdk files i reinstalled / downloaded it and restartet steam. But nothing of the above helped, any suggestions? Havent found anybody else here in the Help forums with that problem.
cheers

item.title: BM wont launch

item.description:
[Solved]
For further reference -> https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12635

Scroll down until you see my post, solution 1 post above

item.title: BM wont launch
item.dc:creator: Axonteer
item.description:
Update: When i “start” the Source SDK Base 2007 i get the same error msg, but when i start the original source SDK (for testing) it works as intended.
Does SDK7 acces the internet and it might just be a ISP issue ?

Read full topic

item.title: BM wont launch
item.dc:creator: Axonteer
item.description:
Heya

Ive installed Source SDK 2007 as requested and used setup exe to install BM.
OFC i’ve rebootet steam, but when i start BM i get the message that says:

“Steam-Error
This game is currently unavailable.
Please try again at another time”.

If this where a normal steam game i would just wait, but because this is a mod im shure there must have went something wrong.

What i’ve done so far:
Re-Downloaded BM via Torrent
Deletet Source SDK 2007 and 2006 (steam installs 2006 together with 2007, dunno why)
After a compleate deletion of all mod/sdk files i reinstalled / downloaded it and restartet steam.
But nothing of the above helped, any suggestions?
Havent found anybody else here in the Help forums with that problem.

cheers

Read full topic
